docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to neureca lab, this is a lab located at the CHBH in University of Birmingham. For more information on the lab please visit the neureca website. The purpose of this page is to provide helpful information you may need while working in this lab, whether you're an undergraduate, postgraduate or even an intern.

docs.title: Journal Papers and Powerpoint Slides
docs.text:
It's important to have consistent filenames when saving files. The format structure we use is :

First-Author's-Surname_Year_Title.file-extention

EXAMPLES:

When saving a pdf:

Park_2018_Representational interactions during audiovisual speech entrainment.pdf

When saving a powerpoint:

Park_2018_Representational interactions during audiovisual speech entrainment.pptx

If the title is too long then use the short title or cut it off.

docs.title: FLUX Pipeline
docs.text:
Please take some time to familiarise youself with the FLUX pipeline developed by Prof. Ole Jenson (Now at Oxford University). Use MNE-Python rather than Fieldtrip the matlab alternative. You can download the data and python scripts to help you understand the pipeline.

  • Flux Pipeline
  • MNE-Python

docs.title: University BEAR Training (Supercomputer)
docs.text:
Here are some resources that you might find helpful when getting started using BEAR. This includes general materials as well as specific recommendations beneath.

  • University Training

    • Intro to Linux
    • Intro to BlueBEAR
    • Software Carpentries - Python (Only if you are a beginner with programming)

  • CHBH on BEAR (Open-Source documentation maintained by a collection of researchers at the CHBH)

docs.title: University Library Services
docs.text:
The University library offers a range of services and socials for researchers to help with working with literature and writing. They also offer other services such as digital skills and effective communication.

  • Library Services
